name: FRigUnit_AddParent
doc:
Adds a new parent to an element. The weight for the new parent will be 0.0.
You can use the SetParentWeights node to change the parent weights later.

Child: * The child to be parented under the new parent
Parent: * The new parent to be added to the child
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
